pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyLiPDPython utilities to interact with the Linked Paleo Data (LiPD) format## Installation pip install pylipd## Usage### Loading local LiPD files from pylipd.lipd import LiPD lipd = LiPD() lipd.load(["MD98_2181.Stott.2007.lpd", "Ant-WAIS-Divide.Severinghaus.2012.lpd", "Asi-TDAXJP.PAGES2k.2013.lpd"])### Loading LiPD data from GraphDB server from pylipd.lipd import LiPD lipd = LiPD() lipd.set_endpoint("https://linkedearth.graphdb.mint.isi.edu/repositories/LiPDVerse2") lipd.load_remote_datasets(["MD98_2181.Stott.2007", "Ant-WAIS-Divide.Severinghaus.2012", "Asi-TDAXJP.PAGES2k.2013"])
